transArray.content: The breakfast is good, the room is a bit small, and the front desk service attitude is very good

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at the Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. It is also very important. Thank you for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. Being able to bring you a pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
